title: Beautifully Redeemed
description: She’s been broken by love. He doesn’t believe it exists. Will their chance at happily ever after be destroyed by her past terror? Kristen swore she’d never return to the place in her haunting nightmares. But when she learns danger no longer lurks in the shadows, she breaks that vow, hoping to build a new life on the ashes of her old one. When her dashing new coworker stirs emotions she thought had long since been buried, she dares to believe knights in shining armor really do exist. But can she risk her heart when she believes she’s no longer worthy of devotion? Liam doesn’t believe in fantasies like love. He’s witnessed the misery caused by chasing elusive dreams. When Kristen turns his world upside down, he wonders if maybe he’s wrong. But something keeps her at a distance—something dark and traumatic. As sparks ignite between them, a dangerous presence resurfaces, threatening their new-found happiness. Will Liam convince Kristen they can have their fairytale ending, or will it all be shattered before their story even begins?
author: Kat Warren
